subtitle: Wireless Audio Mixer & Monitor
description:
AiOke Studio is the ultimate wireless companion for your Yamaha AG06 and AG03 audio interfaces. Control your mix, monitor levels, and manage hardware settings directly from your iPhone.

üéõÔ∏è STUDIO CONTROLLER FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Wireless Hardware Detection: Automatically finds AG06/AG03 units on your local network.
‚Ä¢ Remote Monitoring: Trigger audio diagnostic tests remotely.
‚Ä¢ Networked Audio: Connects via Wi-Fi to your host machine.

üì± DEMO MODE INCLUDED:
‚Ä¢ No Hardware? No Problem. Enable 'Demo Mode' on the home screen to simulate a full studio environment.
‚Ä¢ Perfect for testing UI flows and features without physical audio interfaces connected.

ÔøΩ FOR CREATORS:
‚Ä¢ Streamline your podcast or streaming setup.
‚Ä¢ Walk around your studio while checking signal flow.
‚Ä¢ Instant feedback on device connection status.

‚ö†Ô∏è REQUIREMENTS:
‚Ä¢ Yamaha AG06 or AG03 Audio Interface (for full functionality)
‚Ä¢ Host computer running the AiOke Automation Framework
‚Ä¢ Local Wi-Fi network connection

app_review_information.notes: IMPORTANT FOR REVIEWERS: This app is a hardware controller for Yamaha AG06 interfaces. Since you likely do not have this hardware, we have provided a 'DEMO MODE' toggle on the main screen. Please enable this toggle to verify all application functionality, including device scanning and monitoring simulation, without requiring the physical hardware.

marketing_assets.promotional_text: Create professional karaoke tracks instantly with AI-powered vocal reduction. Record, practice, and perfect your performances with studio-quality effects.
marketing_assets.promotional_keywords: AI karaoke, vocal removal, singing practice, music app, audio effects
